definition: Mt Tai in Shandong/same as 泰山
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Daishan county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Daishan county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Daiyue district of Tai'an city 泰安市[Tai4 an1 shi4], Shandong
Dai Temple, a temple in Shandong for the god of Mount Tai
Haidai, historical region extending from the Bohai Sea to Mt Tai in Shandong
another name for Mt Tai 泰山 in Shandong as principal or ancestor of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]/Mt Tai as resting place for departed souls
Wang Daiyu (1584-1670), Hui Islamic scholar of the Ming-Qing transition
light as a goose feather, heavy as Mt Tai (idiom); of no consequence to one person, a matter of life or death to another

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在缅甸传统的直桑岱点灯节，人们参观仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: Liang Zongdai is one of them.
Then they came fighting out of the door of The Index.
sentences.chinese: 只看到他们从印岱克斯的门里扭打出来。

sentences.english: The third chapter makes reflections on the significance of the theory of modern poetic form from Liang.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，对梁宗岱的新诗形式理论的意义作简要思考。

sentences.english: Over the weekend I’ve been in Fort Lauderdale as part of a performing arts seminar.
sentences.chinese: 整个周末，我都在罗德岱堡参加一个表演艺术研讨会。

sentences.english: We acn phone Adai again tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们明天再给阿岱打个电话。

sentences.english: Was she forced to clean out her checking account in Ft.
sentences.chinese: 在罗德岱堡，她被强迫清理自己的支票账户吗？

sentences.english: Advocating truthfulness and realism in writing is the overall characteristic of Zhang Dai's literary works.
sentences.chinese: 尚真写实是张岱文学创作的总体特征。

sentences.english: Last, but not least, we touch upon the great influence of his translation on his poetics.
sentences.chinese: 最后指出梁宗岱的翻译对其诗学的重要影响。

sentences.english: is certainly different from doing it in Riverdale back in New York.
sentences.chinese: 比起回到纽约的里佛岱自杀当然是不同的。

sentences.english: The first chapter focuses on the cultural personality and academic thought of Liang Zongdai.
sentences.chinese: 这一章揭示了梁宗岱多向度的人生发展轨迹。

sentences.english: The second chapter discusses universe ontological philosophy and aesthetic conception theory of Liang Zongdai.
sentences.chinese: 这一章首先考察了梁宗岱美学思想的哲学特征。

sentences.english: Dai village, the old name "Dai feng".

sentences.chinese: 第二章，阐述梁宗岱新诗形式理论的主要内容。
